lines: Mike Brady is always calling you names and stepping all over your nice shiny shoes. Today he is carrying a large bag of groceries from the store.
You think of two ways that you can get back at stupid Mike.
#RUN BY AND RIP THE BAG SO EVERYTHING FALLS OUT
#PUT YOUR FOOT OUT AND TRIP HIM AS HE WALKS BY
You take a big lead and start running toward him.
Just before you get him, he moves away. You see him carefully remove an egg from the bag. Uh, oh...

You rip open the bag and potatoes come rolling out all over the sidewalk. He is chasing them down the block. "NICE MASHED POTATOES, BRADY!" Revenge is sweet, but watch out. He just might have the last laugh by marrying you one day.

THAT WAS MEAN! You could have hurt him like that. Fortunately, you didn't. He only bothers you because he has a crush on you. I know that is not important to you now, but later when he turns into a gorgeous hunk, you'll be wishing he'd
